divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife & i left a restaurant last sunday night and we were walking to our car at the back of the restaurant. it was dark out as the clocks had been turned back the previous evening. i noticed this bright round object and told my wife to look while i was pointing at it. it appeared to be quite high in the sky and was travelling at an enormous rate of speed. it travelled from our right to our left and disappeared from view
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Buffalo
There was one other sighting in Buffalo on or around November 2nd 2008
